name: Podolu
description:
Approach

From the parking from where you can see the last waterfall just after Trenta valley you cross the river Soƒça and follow the path to the waterfall. Before the waterfall you take the path on the left. The hike is quite steep with nice views. After about 1 hour you get to the stream, where you enter the canyon.

Descent

Year 2021 - almost all anchors were in good shape

C9 anchor on the right C30 anchor on the left C4 C10 C10 C17 C6 T2 C7 C4 C4 C35 exposed anchor on the left (no bolt for making a rope fence) C45 anchor on the left C10 C4 C22 anchor on the right D4 C25 anchor on the left C50 anchor on the left on the overhang

Exit

Red tape
